comments: Evaluators unanimously expressed praise for the course and for Dr. Summers’ vast knowledge of the material and teaching ability.  Students commended her for her accessibility, enthusiasm, and enlightening lectures.  Many students also gave high marks to the discussions in class, although a few students wished the class would be smaller.  Numerous evaluators mentioned that the community service aspect of the course was the most interesting and valuable part of the class.  As one student said, this course is “extremely applicable to anyone who eats.”
